remarks: Distributive law for inner product (left-distributivity).  Complex version of ~ ipdi .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphipcj.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
cphipcj.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphdir.P $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
cphdi $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( A ., ( B .+ C ) ) = ( ( A ., B ) + ( A ., C ) ) ) $.
